summary: Meeting a man on the Internet, Julia decides to see him in person, only to get abducted and branded with the letter "x" by that guy. A game of cat and mouse follows, but the story has an unexpected twist.
cast: Valerie Azlynn|Kevin Sorbo|Alicia Leigh Willis|Joel David Moore|Ving Rhames|Gregg Brazzel|Cassie Shea Watson|Saxon Sharbino|Megan Rainwater|Kasi Scarbrough Corley|Sarah Duncan|Courtney Rawls|Brad Rachal|Lindsay Small Barrios|M Charlotte Cheatham|Ted Ferguson|Michael Kober|Kari J. Kramer|James B. McDaniel|Michael Showers
title: Julia X
